```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) #plot
library(plotly) #interactiveness
```

# page1

## row1

```{r, warning=FALSE}
p1 <- ggplot(starwars, aes (x= mass, y= height, text=name)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p1)
```

## row2 {.tabset}

```{r}
#| title: barchart


p2 <- ggplot(starwars, aes (x= name, y= height, fill=gender)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")

ggplotly(p2)
```

```{r}
#| title: table

starwars <- starwars %>% 
  select(name, height, mass, species)

knitr::kable(starwars)
```
